cmp: 子 (11 p.m.-1 a.m./1st earthly branch/child/midnight/son/child/seed/egg/small thing, (noun suff.))
mng: to go against, to be contrary to, perverse, rebellious

exm.mng: to go against, to be contrary to, perverse, rebellious
to run in parallel without hindrance, not mutually exclusive, two processes can be implemented without conflict
to transgress, to violate (the rules), same as 違背|违背
variant of 悖謬|悖谬[bei4 miu4]
to rebel, sedition, to delude, confused
